channel.title: Hardware on MythWeaver
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on MythWeaver

item.title: iPod Nano from 2008 (3rd Gen)
item.description: Today, unexpectedly, I found my iPod Nano from 2008, with the iTunes Library inside, untouched since those years. It was as if I had found a time capsule.

item.title: About Soundcards
item.description: Sound systems in computers have fascinated me for years, I have done countless research on them, but my knowledge is still very superficial. Every year, at certain times, I do research about old computers, sound cards, graphics cards, games, and learn over and over again what I know. I worked a lot on sound cards, especially on Sound Blaster and its models. Although I know many fine details, I have learned many things wrongly due to the information pollution on the internet and the indirect explanation of some expressions instead of the correct ones.
